title: Best of The Herd: 08/22/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/22/2019
description:
Colin says the Packers should be drafting Quarterbacks all of the time just like the Patriots because that's how every team should operate. Colin ranks his top Head Coach/QB duos that will have the most success over the next ten years.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films breaks down the AFC and NFC South and John Elway tells Colin how playing in the NFL for so long helps him as a talent evaluator  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
